message: The SDG_RELATED_INDICATORS field for indicator 14-5-1, translated into en
data:
In addition to the coverage by protected areas of important sites for marine biodiversity as an indicator towards SDG 14.5, other disaggregations of particular relevance as indicators towards SDG targets (Brooks et al. 2016) include:

SDG 15.1.2 Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type.

SDG 15.4.1 Coverage by protected areas of important sites for mountain biodiversity.
